name: AP_CLAIM_IF_SVC_GRP_MOD5
description: This table contains edits returned from the third party interface for the fifth modifier.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: MODIFIER_5_EDIT
columns.description: The edits returned from the third party interface for the fifth modifier.
